method.name: get_duration
method.description: Returns the total duration of the Lottie animation in seconds.

method.name: get_frame_image
method.description: Returns an [Image] representing the specified frame of the Lottie animation.

method.name: get_image
method.description: Returns an [Image] representing the current frame of the Lottie animation.

method.name: get_image_size
method.description: Returns the size of the images used in the Lottie animation as a [Vector2i].

method.name: get_total_frame
method.description: Returns the total number of frames in the Lottie animation.

method.name: load_json
method.description: Loads a Lottie animation from a JSON file. The scale parameter allows you to adjust the size of the animation.

method.name: load_string
method.description: Loads a Lottie animation from a string. The scale parameter allows you to adjust the size of the animation.

method.name: update_frame
method.description: Updates the current frame of the Lottie animation.
